description: Search, install and manage Agent Skills for GitHub Copilot, Claude Code and AI coding assistants
config.instructionFile.markdownDescripti: File to register installed skills *(requires Auto Update Instruction enabled)*
config.customInstructionPath.markdownDes: Custom file path *(only used when Instruction File is set to 'custom')*
config.autoUpdateInstruction.description: Automatically update instruction file on install/uninstall
config.autoUpdateInstruction.markdownDes: **Automatically update instruction file** (AGENTS.md etc.) on skill install/uninstall
config.includeLocalSkills.description: Include local skills (outside of skills directory) in instruction file
config.includeLocalSkills.markdownDescri: Include local skills (outside of skills directory) in instruction file *(requires Auto Update Instruction enabled)*
config.githubToken.description: GitHub Personal Access Token for API requests (increases rate limit from 60 to 5000 requests/hour)
config.githubToken.markdownDescription: GitHub Personal Access Token (increases rate limit from 60 to 5000 requests/hour). [Create a token here](https://github.com/settings/tokens/new?scopes=public_repo&description=Agent%20Skill%20Ninja)
config.outputFormat.markdownDescription: **Output format** for skill list. When 'auto' is selected, the format is detected from workspace files (.cursor/, CLAUDE.md, etc.)
config.outputFormat.markdown: Markdown - GitHub Copilot, Claude (AGENTS.md, CLAUDE.md, copilot-instructions.md)
config.enableToolDetection.markdownDescr: **Enable tool detection** - Automatically detect AI tools in workspace and suggest appropriate format
